snippet: In a region where many governments criminalize divination, Lebanon stands apart for featuring its star soothsayers on New Year’s Eve, when they make predictions in TV specials.
abstract: Leila Abdel Latif, prominent Lebanese fortuneteller who appears on television, has become a widely watched New Year’s Eve tradition in the Arab world; religious extremism is on rise in region and Lebanon stands apart for allowing fortunetellers a leading role; they also provide private consultations.
lead_paragraph: In a region where many governments criminalize divination, Lebanon stands apart for featuring its star soothsayers on New Year’s Eve, when they make predictions in TV specials.

headline.main: When Celebrity Fortunetellers Talk, the Lebanese Listen
headline.print_headline: When Celebrity Fortunetellers Talk, the Lebanese Listen
